basics.name: Sarah Chen
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior software engineer with 8 years of experience building scalable backend systems and leading engineering teams. Passionate about distributed systems, developer experience, and mentoring junior engineers.

work.name: TechCorp Inc
work.summary: Lead backend engineer for payment processing platform serving 50M+ users
highlights: Designed microservices architecture handling 10M+ daily transactions
Led team of 5 engineers, mentored 3 junior developers
Reduced system latency by 40% through database optimization and caching
Implemented event-driven architecture using Kafka for real-time processing
Established code review practices and CI/CD pipelines

work.name: StartupXYZ
highlights: Built real-time inventory management system processing 100K updates/hour
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Designed RESTful APIs consumed by mobile and web clients
